OrgName.entry: SOUTH YORKSHIRE AFRICAN-CARIBBEAN BUSINESS AND ENTERPRISE TRAINING CENTRE LTD (SYAC LTD)

Desc.entry: Provides managed workspaces, office accommodation for business start-ups, a nursery, conference and computer suites for training, business advice, counselling and support. Also acts as an access point for referral to other agencies. Used primarily by African-Caribbean and Asian communities but open to all. Company limited by guarantee no 3121067.

category.entry: BLACK AND MINORITY ETHNIC PEOPLE - COMMUNITY ORGANISATIONS
